content: Varitas CoinLaunched: 14.05.2022.Consensus: Proof Of WorkAlgorithm: Scrypt Max Supply:   2000 millionBlock Time: 2.5 minutesDecimal Places: 8Dev Taxes: 0premine: 1000 millionTicker: VTCDifficulty Retargets: Every 3.5 daysHalving Period: Every 4 yearsVTC is a fully decentralized peer-to-peer digital currency that enables fast and almost zero-cost transactions, supported by complex mathematics to secure the network even better.VTC features faster transaction confirmation times with a secure network.We aim to create the most secure and zero transaction fee cryptocurrency. so Individuals can easily and securely control their finances.And one of the best Advantages of VTC is our weekly Rewards.Members can get free VTC @ https://vtcdistribution.comEvery week, we will give 5% bonus of your wallet balance. And rewards will be given in Litecoin.To get Latest Information about VTC, Join Our Telegram Group: https://t.me/+ZI8wgormBo0wZjNh

comments.author: Certusme
comments.created_time: May 15, 2022, 07:41:53 AMLast edit: May 15, 2022, 07:58:13 AM by Certusme
comments.body: Sorry to say, We have noticed some other Coin is already there with the short form VTC. So we can't continue with the same short form. We request all members to please suggest us with some unique short form for our coin Varitas.  This credit goes to our friend @weihui23456, our telegram group member. We promise a good reward, once we got the new name and successfully altered that.A big reward!!!Suggest a unique short form for our Varitas coin and get good reward.

It will be 5% of earned balance. We count 0.01$/ coin and will distribute incentives in LTC.Note: There is 5% of referral commission also.(5% of of earnings). Use your referral link and introduce your friends to earn more and more.

comments.author: Certusme
comments.body: Dear members. 21st May 2022 is our 1st incentive processing day. Let us celebrate it with double incentive. Please send your working  user id, telegram user id and LTC wallet id to our contact address ( https://vtcdistribution.com/contact.php) All members should join in both vtc distrubution group and Antal coin sell and Buy group. We will process 100 free antal to all user ids, who are in Antal sell and buy  group.  and weekly incentives to your LTC wallet. To celebrate our 1st incentive processing day, all members will get 10% of their dash bord balance, instead of our usual 5%. Incentives will be in LTC.Note: Multiple accounts are not allowed. If we detect any such accounts,  we will ban all accounts with out any notice or intimation.

comments.author: Certusme
comments.created_time: May 21, 2022, 11:21:26 AMLast edit: May 21, 2022, 11:50:34 AM by Certusme
comments.body: We noticed internal transactions. If we detects multiple accounts of any user. We will suspend all the accounts of that user. Every user should have telegram ID.  Trading should be done through our trading group only. No direct trading or direct transaction will be accepted. We treat them as multiple accountsBy  4 PM GMT we are going to process 1st weekly rewards . To celebrate our 1st  week, we are processing 10% of dash board balance as weekly incentive, instead of 5%.  To get weekly rewards, users should send their LTC wallet id, dash board user id and telegram user id to our contact mail. You can get our contact link at the top of our web page.  or go to https://vtcdistribution.com/contact.phpAs we warned earlier, we banned all the accounts, which have direct internal transaction. We consider these accounts as multiple accounts of the same person.Note: Before processing our 1st weekly incentives, we are banning all span accounts. If any one feels it is by mistake, Please provide your proof of identity. Because we want to reward only genuine users. If we don't take strict action against spam accounts, our faucet will be dried de to few selfish users. And we will loss our genuine users.

comments.author: Certusme
comments.body: Note: Today at 4 PM GMT, 1st weekly incentives will be processed to all the users, who shared their details properly. There will be no more  time extension.
